means: 布拉灰族的；布拉灰人的；布拉灰语的
布拉灰族；布拉灰人；布拉灰语

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a Dravidian people living in Pakistan
2. an isolated Dravidian language spoken by the Brahui people in Pakistan

auth_sentence.content: The Dravidian languages...have left behind them a solitary outpost in the Brahui.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Dravidian languages...have left behind them a solitary outpost in the Brahui.
